thread.title: One Direction announce their most intimate show ever with The London Session - Music
thread.title_full: One Direction announce their most intimate show ever with The London Session - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Lewis Corner
title: One Direction announce their most intimate show ever with The London Session - Music
text: The day One Direction fans are dreading is quickly approaching (the moment they go on hiatus in March), so the boyband have decided to cheer them up before that with their most intimate show ever.The group will play a very special set called The London Session on November 14 to support the release of their fifth studio album Made in the AM.The show has been organised in collaboration with Apple Music, and fans who miss out on the one-off event will be able to watch it back on the service shortly afterwards.The gig will take place in a secret location in the UK capital, and fans from all over the world will have the chance to attend. Further details on how tickets will be distributed will be announced in the coming weeks. Â© Rex Features / David Fisher One Direction will release their new album Made in the AM on November 13, and will face a major chart battle with new releases from Justin Bieber and last year's X Factor winner Ben Haenow.The collection will include their latest chart-topping hit 'Drag Me Down', as well as recent promotional track 'Infinity'.
